name: 江湖侠客行
description: 江湖侠客行是一款讲究见招拆招的武侠卡牌单机游戏，简单易上手，但要想通关却需要多多动脑，在游戏中，玩家将扮演一名初出茅庐的门派弟子，参与到江湖的各种事件中.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel 双核G4600 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 450 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 7100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 550 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
